content.question: Which of the following best explains the potential impact of rising global temperatures on agricultural regions?

choices.label: The wheat belt will shift northward.
Polar regions will dry out, making cultivation impossible.
Nomadic herding will end as conditions become too harsh.
Centers of market gardening will shift to the Arctic Circle.

content.answer: The wheat belt will shift northward.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain the significance of geographic similarities and differences among different locations and/or at different times.
